Sentencas: In this paper, we propose a simple approach consisting in the use of a coating layer on a commercial SOFC in order to increase its fuel flexibility.
Titulo: A simple approach to make the commercial solid, oxide fuel cells flexible in the use of fuels - CK-3L05

Sentencas: Using the same CO2-laser-cut cell, we compared the I-V curves and impedance spectra (EIS) of four experiments.
Titulo: A simple approach to make the commercial solid, oxide fuel cells flexible in the use of fuels - CK-3L05

Sentencas: Three different ceramics (NiCu-CGO, NiFe-CGO, and NiCo-CGO) were evaluated as protective layers for cells fed with dry biogas or bioethanol, with the goal of determining which layer would be most promising.
Titulo: A simple approach to make the commercial solid, oxide fuel cells flexible in the use of fuels - CK-3L05

Sentencas: Electrochemical experiments revealed that an additional layer adds resistance to the cell, which negatively affects its performance.
Titulo: A simple approach to make the commercial solid, oxide fuel cells flexible in the use of fuels - CK-3L05

Sentencas: A slight decrease in maximum performance was observed when the coated cells were fed H-2.
Titulo: A simple approach to make the commercial solid, oxide fuel cells flexible in the use of fuels - CK-3L05

Sentencas: However, power density was not significantly different from the bare cell at potentials between 0.7 and 0.8 V, which provide a trade-off between performance and voltage efficiency.
Titulo: A simple approach to make the commercial solid, oxide fuel cells flexible in the use of fuels - CK-3L05

Sentencas: Additionally, such an approach improved the effectiveness of cells in using simulated biogas and ethanol as demonstrated by I-V curves and EIS analysis.
Titulo: A simple approach to make the commercial solid, oxide fuel cells flexible in the use of fuels - CK-3L05

Sentencas: As shown in the test results, NiCo-CGO provided the highest power density of 0.56 W cm(-2) at 0.6 V.
Titulo: A simple approach to make the commercial solid, oxide fuel cells flexible in the use of fuels - CK-3L05

Sentencas: However, all the cells with protective layers performed significantly better than the bare cell in the dry biofuel tests.
Titulo: A simple approach to make the commercial solid, oxide fuel cells flexible in the use of fuels - CK-3L05
